message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my [Product Name], which I know you've been interested in.  It's a valuable asset, and I'm confident it will be a great addition to your [Bob's Business/Collection/etc.]. I'm willing to let it go for $1,400,000.  This is a great deal for both of us, as it's significantly below what it's worth to you. Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details.
